posts.post_content:
T3 Turkey Red Dick  Hoblitzell.   Asking 400 OBO. First to say "I take it" on a PM trumps any ongoing negotiations.  Will also consider offers on individual cards.

#97 Dick Hoblitzell with a Turkey Red Back.  Card looks really nice with moderately touched corners and minor/moderate surface wear.  Card presents extremely nicely.

Also taking offers on the individual cards, too
Bender and Burns sold.  All adjusted for Hoblitzel.
